name: Factory of the Living Dead
description:
Created by Serenity Era Games for the 2021 Zach-like Game Jam.   

You play the role of a talented Necromancer, who is hired by the Dark Lord to produce an army of macabre minions.  Test your wits to meet the Dark Lord's unreasonable demands, and make the greatest necromantic factory the world has ever seen.

Contains mild blood and gore, and an overwhelming amount of skeletons.

Serenity Era Games is an independent game development studio consisting of  Gus Wellman, Scott Corder, Garrick Ablett, and Brian Chu.  We are based in Northern California, and we are interested in working in a wide variety of game genres.

If you liked this game, please let us know.  If you are interested in reaching out to us you can email us at SerenityEraGames@gmail.com
